info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 6 at 5:17PM CDT until April 6 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
FFWSHV
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Imminent Levee Failure on the McKinney Bayou along McKinney Bayou Levee in...East Central Miller County and extreme West Central Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas.
* Until 800 PM CDT.
* At 517 PM CDT, Emergency management reported four confirm overtopping on McKinney Bayou Levee on the McKinney Bayou Near the intersection of Highway 196 and Miller County Road 61. This is causing flash flooding of immediately surrounding areas.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from a levee failure possible.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas near the levee break.
* Garland City, Rocky Mound
This includes the following streams and drainages... Maniece Bayou, Boggy Creek, Beech Creek, Kenney Creek, Red River and McKinney Bayou.
info.instruction:
If you are in low lying areas near and along the McKinney Bayou Levee you should move to higher ground immediately.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 8:00 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 8:00 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 8:00 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 8:00 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
